REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0848 reute d f BC-PANTERA'S--<PANT>-ACQ 04-03 0044

TEXT.TITLE: PANTERA'S <PANT> ACQUIRES 10 RESTAURANTS
TEXT.BODY: Pantera's Corp said it closed on its agreement to acquire ten pizza restaurant locations in southeastern Colorado. It said the purchase price was 1,250,000 dlrs, which was paid by cash and stock. Reuter
